message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the enthusiasm. However, $90 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $75 for this product.  What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 might be a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm thinking of a price of $85. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down in price.  However, $85 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm prepared to pay $80 for this product.  This is my final offer.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I've already compromised a lot by coming down to $85. I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm thinking of a price of $82.50. It's a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
